title: Add symlinks for standard %USERPROFILE% subdirectories to $HOME
body: It would simplify interoperability if the %USERPROFILE% and $HOME directories were more reflective of each other. While symlinking $HOME directly to %USERPROFILE% may cause interoperability problems, having matching subdirectories should be less problematic.

comments.body: I in fact do (in Linux) create a symlink from ~/oneDrive to (in effect) /mnt/c//Users/<name>/OneDrive.
